UpdateCarModelRequest.description: Request to update car model information

RegistrationRequest.description: Request to register a new user

CreateDocumentRequest.description: Request to create a new document

CreateContractRequest.description: Request to create a new rental contract

carId.description: Unique identifier of the car to rent

dataStart.description: Start date and time of the rental period

dataEnd.description: End date and time of the rental period (must be after start date)

dailyRate.description: Daily rental rate for the car

totalCost.description: Total cost of the rental contract

bodyType.description: Body type of the rented car

yearOfIssue.description: Year of manufacture of the rented car

lastName.description: Last name of the client renting the car

vin.description: Vehicle Identification Number of the rented car

gosNumber.description: State registration number of the rented car

favorite.description: Is the car in user's favorites

CreateCarModelRequest.description: Request to create a new car model

CreateCarModelName.description: Request to create a new car model name

CreateCarModelsBrand.description: Request to create a new car model brand

yearOfIssue.description: Year of issue of the car

gosNumber.description: State registration number of the car

vin.description: Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the car

favorite.description: Is the car in user's favorites

dateOfIssue.description: Date of issue (cannot be in the future)

UpdateContractRequest.description: Request to update rental contract dates

dataStart.description: Updated start date and time of the rental period

dataEnd.description: Updated end date and time of the rental period (must be after start date)

MinMaxCellForFilters.description: Minimum and maximum cell values for filters
